description.value: This supports the exchange of time periods. The extension time period is carried along with a code to identify whether the data is record for legal, operational, or system effective periods.

purpose.value: This extension was created from an ODS use-case in which there is a requirement to hold data for Legal and Operational dates, an additional code value of "system-effective" period, is now added to enable the use of this extension in RelatedPerson network use case.

short.value: This supports the recording of duration of a specified type.

definition.value: This supports the recording of duration of a specified type. The period is carried along with a code to identify the type of duration.

short.value: Whether the Date Period is 'Legal' , 'Operational', or "System-Effective"
